item.title: Data Objects in Databricks
item.description: Metastore and Catalog In Databricks, metadata of data Objects (tables, views, etc.) is registered in Metastore. Previously, Databricks uses Hive metastore by default to register schemas, tables, and views. However, it’s highly recommended to upgrade to Unity Catalog to access centralized access control, auditing, lineage, and data discovery capabilities. Catalog is a group of databases. If you want to use Unity Catalog, create and specify Catalog is required (Set up and manage Unity Catalog).
